content: **crocheted bag in drops paris ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern w-922 yarn group c ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** height without strap approx 12 cm width approx 21 cm length of strap approx 50 cm **yarn** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100 g colour 17 off white **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge** 17 double crochets in width and 20 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm note remember that the hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
